item.Q:
Write the character:
to drop; to fall
item.A:
diào
去掉 qùdiào to delete; to remove

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to seem; to appear; to resemble; similar; -like; pseudo-
2: similar
item.A:
1: sì 2: shì
相似 xiāngsì to resemble; similar; like; resemblance; similarity 近似值 jìnshìzhí approximant

item.Q:
Write the character:
exactly; in good order; whole; complete; entire; in order; orderly; to repair; to mend; to renovate; to make sb suffer; to punish; to fix; to give sb a hard time
item.A:
zhěng
整个 (整個) zhěnggè whole; entire; total

item.Q:
Write the character:
to pull (to draw a bow); to draw or stretch sth; to attract; to lead; to divert (water); to guide
item.A:
yǐn
引起 yǐnqǐ to give rise to; to lead to; to cause; to arouse

item.Q:
Write the character:
team; class; squad; work shift; classifier for groups; ranking; surname Ban
item.A:
bān
班长 (班長) bānzhǎng class monitor; squad leader; team leader

item.Q:
Write the character:
bewilder; crazy about; fan; enthusiast; lost; confused
item.A:
迷 (strokes unavailable)
mí
迷信 míxìn superstition

similar

整个 (整個) zhěnggè whole; entire; total

item.Q:
Write the character: tú
(qǐtú de tú)
item.A:
traditional: 圖
diagram; to plan; picture; drawing; chart
企图 (企圖) qǐtú attempt
qùdiào to delete; to remove
shīdiào lose; miss

traditional: 掉轉
diàozhuǎi turn round

traditional: 掉隊
diàoduì drop out

traditional: 掉頭
diàotóu (v) turn around

sìhu to seem
sìhū apparently; to seem; to appear; as if; seemingly
sìde seem as if; rather like
hǎosì to seem; to be like
xiāngsì to resemble; similar; like; resemblance; similarity
jìnsì similar; about the same as; approximately; approximation

traditional: 類似
lèisì similar; analogous
xiūzhěng repair; maintenance
wánzhěng complete; intact
píngzhěng smooth; level; to level off; to flatten (remove bumps)
zhěngxiū refit

traditional: 整個
zhěnggè whole; entire; total
zhěngtiān all day long; all
zhěngzhěng whole; full

traditional: 整數
zhěngshù (n) integer; whole number
zhěngliú commutate
zhěngliúqì commutator
zhěnglǐ arrange; sort out; list systematically
zhěngchú to divide exactly without remainder (in integer arithmetic); exact division

traditional: 整隊
zhěngduì to dress (troops); to line up (to arrange in a straight line)

traditional: 整風
zhěngfēng (polit.) Rectification or Rectifying incorrect work styles, a Maoist slogan

traditional: 整體
zhěngtǐ global; overall; as a whole; whole (thing, situation); entirety; integrated
yǐnrù to draw into; to pull into
yǐnchū extract
yǐnlì gravitation (force); attraction
yǐnzi primer
yǐnlǐ lemma
yǐnyòng quote; cite

traditional: 引發
yǐnfā lead to; trigger; initiate

traditional: 引線
yǐnxiàn a fuse; an electrical lead; a leading-line; a pull-through
yǐnyán foreword; introduction
yǐnqǐ to give rise to; to lead to; to cause; to arouse

traditional: 引進
yǐnjìn recommend; introduce from elsewhere
zhǐyǐn guide; show

traditional: 萬有引力
wànyǒuyǐnlì gravity
shàngbān to go to work; to be on duty; to start work; to go to the office
xìabān to come or go or get off work
jīabān (v) work overtime
xiǎobān subcompartment
jiēbān to work one's shift; to succeed to a position; to take over a job (on the next shift); to relieve sb as successor
jiēbānrén successor

traditional: 換班
huànbān to change shift; the next work shift; to relieve (a workman on the previous shift); to take over the job
bānzhǔrèn a teacher in charge of a class
bānzi organized group; theatrical troupe

traditional: 班機
bānjī airliner; airplane; plane
bāncì order of classes or grades at school; number of runs or flights

traditional: 班級
bānjí classes or grades in school

traditional: 班組
bānzǔ group or team (in factories etc)

traditional: 班車
bānchē regular bus (service)

traditional: 班長
bānzhǎng class monitor; squad leader; team leader
gēnbān (n) attendant; entourage
rùmí to be fascinated; to be enchanted
mírén fascinating; enchanting; charming; tempting
míxìn superstition
míshī (v) become lost; not know one's location

traditional: 力圖
lìtú try hard to; strive to

traditional: 圖形
túxíng depiction; a picture; a figure; a diagram; a graph

traditional: 圖書
túshū books (in a library or bookstore)

traditional: 圖案
túàn design; pattern

traditional: 圖樣
túyàng diagram; blueprint

traditional: 圖片
túpiàn image; picture

traditional: 圖畫
túhuà drawing; picture

traditional: 圖章
túzhāng stamp; seal

traditional: 圖表
túbiǎo chart; diagram

traditional: 圖解
tújiě diagrammatize

traditional: 圖象
túxiàng picture

traditional: 地圖
dìtú map

traditional: 平面圖
píngmiàntú a plan; a planar graph; a plane figure

traditional: 意圖
yìtú intent; intention; intend

traditional: 有利可圖
yǒulìkětú profitable

traditional: 版圖
bǎntú domain; territory

traditional: 畫圖
huàtú to draw designs, maps etc; picture (e.g. of life in the city)

traditional: 立體圖
lìtǐtú three-dimensional figure; hologram; stereogram

traditional: 統計圖
tǒngjìtú statistical chart

traditional: 視圖
shìtú view

traditional: 試圖
shìtú to attempt; to try
